mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.version AS "version", a.url AS "url", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM library a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO library ( id, name, version, url, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{version}, #{url}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE library SET name = #{name}, version = #{version}, url = #{url}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
